Package org.netbeans.swing.etable

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QuickFilter
    Interface for displaying only rows that have particular value in given column.
    TableColumnSelector.TreeNode
    A node in the tree of available column names.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ETable
    Extended JTable (ETable) adds these features to JTable: The notion of fully editable (non-editable) table.
    ETable.RowMapping
    Item to the collection when doing the sorting of table rows.
    ETableColumn
    Special type of TableColumn object used by ETable.
    ETableColumnModel
    Column model implementation for ETable.
    ETableTransferable
    Transferable for use with the ETable.
    ETableTransferHandler
    Used for creating a proper clipboard representation.
    TableColumnSelector
    This class allows to supply alternative implementation of the column selection functionality in ETable.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ETable.ColumnSelection
    The visible column selection methods.
